# Leading Analytics Podcast

## Inderpol Bhandari, Global Chief Data Officer at IBM

In the 30th episode of IIA’s Leading Analytics podcast, IIA CEO Jack Phillips chats with Inderpal Bhandari, Global Chief Data Officer for IBM, a company deeply rooted in the data, analytics, and technology world.
